name: Rafiluis De Los Santos
description: I build digital experiences for the web and mobile devices

Implemented a client portal redesign with React, Next.js, and Ruby on Rails, facilitating efficient communication between designers and stakeholders through continuous feedback loops and integration of 3rd party APIs.

Managed ongoing enhancements and maintenance of a critical filtering feature in an internal application, actively participating in code reviews, pairing, and refactoring to ensure code quality and functionality.

Led a proof of concept for cross-platform mobile app development using React Native, Android core functionality, and Zendesk, collaborating closely with UI/UX designers and stakeholders to optimize user experience and prepare for potential client deployment on the Google Play Store.

Mentored future software engineers in JavaScript, emphasizing language intricacies, coding best practices, and style principles, while offering personalized one-on-one guidance to nurture their career development.
Conducted code assessments, provided constructive feedback on coding style and practices, and contributed to the establishment of internal best practices through training and active participation.
Contributed in developing admissions software for higher education using Angular, MongoDB, and Node.js

Additionally, optimized front-end rendering logic to significantly decrease load times and enhance browser efficiency by 60%, and collaborated with senior engineers to implement reactive forms with custom validations and auto-saving functionality using JSON stored within MongoDB documents, alongside refactoring CSS for mobile-responsive applications.

Delivered a seamless 100% remote film festival experience by designing dynamic schedules, integrating WordPress headless CMS via GraphQL and REST APIs for e-commerce, and enhancing overall UX with React, Gatsby.js, SCSS, and Elevent's APIs.
